author: rjected
content: not geth, but we added the `yParity` field alongside `v` here https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/pull/3800 for backwards compatibility and in the future (when it's more clear that CLs will accept `yParity` without `v`) would move to a sum type so that `v` only appears on legacy txs, and `yParity` appears on type 1/2/etc txs.
